H0.text: Who killed Jean Paul Marat. Maximilien Robespierre

H1.text: Who killed Jean Paul Marat. Georges Danton

H2.text: Who killed Jean Paul Marat. Paul Barras

H3.text: Who killed Jean Paul Marat. Charlotte Corday

A4.text: Charlotte Corday assassinated revolutionary and Jacobin leader Jean-Paul Marat on 13 July 1793.

A5.text: Corday killed Marat by fatally stabbing him with a knife while he was taking a medicinal bath.
